title: Shadow Rider (Shadow #1) by Christine Feehan (ePub)

With little left to her name, Francesca Cappello has come to Chicago in hopes of a new life. She wasnâ€™t expecting to attract the attention of a man with primal hunger in his eyes, driven to claim her as his to protect and to please. And if he discovers her secret, it could ruin her
